_metadata.notes: Without Apollo API key or Brave Search API, verified individual emails were limited. General company emails are verified from contact pages. Team names/titles confirmed from company websites. Phone numbers confirmed from Apartments.com and company sites. PRIORITY: Get Apollo API key to enrich these leads with verified personal emails.

leads.name: Jed Weidauer
leads.title: Director of Business Development
leads.address: 6655 S. Eastern Ave., Suite 200, Las Vegas, NV 89119
leads.notes: KEY CONTACT - Business development role = decision maker for vendor partnerships. WestCorp is Nevada's leader in lease-up communities. Email is company general (verified from contact page). Jed responsible for growing portfolio. NVSAA member.

leads.name: Bob Weidauer
leads.title: CEO
leads.address: 6655 S. Eastern Ave., Suite 200, Las Vegas, NV 89119
leads.notes: Founder/CEO. 40 years in real estate. Portfolio >$125M. Contact through general email or Jed (BD). Also: jovanna@westcorpmg.com confirmed as employee email (Growjo)

leads.name: Paula B.
leads.title: Regional Director
leads.property: 8 communities in Las Vegas area (200-440 units each)
leads.address: 6655 S. Eastern Ave., Suite 200, Las Vegas, NV 89119
leads.notes: 20+ years in apartment industry. Former NVSAA board president. Oversees 8 Las Vegas communities. CPM designation.

leads.name: Coralynn P.
leads.title: Regional Director
leads.address: 6655 S. Eastern Ave., Suite 200, Las Vegas, NV 89119
leads.notes: Oversees new development and lease-up communities worth $450M+ in Las Vegas. Experience with properties 250-1400 units. Community event organizer - Three Squares partnerships.

leads.name: Reinier Santana
leads.title: CEO
leads.address: Las Vegas, NV
leads.notes: HIGHEST PRIORITY - Largest multifamily owner/operator in Las Vegas. $1.5B assets under management. Family-owned (Molasky family). 350+ employees. Manages: Positano, and 35+ other communities. Need to find email - try LinkedIn or pop-in visit.

leads.name: Rebecca Corey
leads.title: VP of Property Management
leads.address: Las Vegas, NV
leads.notes: VP of Property Management = IDEAL contact for vending/smart market vendor partnerships. Ovation is 100% Las Vegas focused. Communities in Henderson, Summerlin, South LV, NW LV.

leads.name: Sarah Pruit
leads.title: Director of Marketing
leads.address: Las Vegas, NV
leads.notes: Marketing director - may be receptive to amenity partnerships. Ovation focuses on 'lifestyle programs' for residents.

leads.address: 10151 W. Park Run Dr., Las Vegas, NV 89145
leads.notes: Family-owned since 1978. Nevada's leader in multifamily property management. 100% fee managed. Properties include: Las Vegas Grand, Boca Raton Luxury Condos, Mod at Riverwalk II, Americana Palos Verdes, The Oslo, Village of Santo Domingo.

immediate: Get Apollo API key configured (APOLLO_API_KEY env var) - this will allow email enrichment for ALL 30+ leads
Get Brave Search API key configured - enables web search without browser
Pop-in visit to Ovation corporate office (Las Vegas) - they're the #1 target (10,000+ units, local family company)
Pop-in visit to Stout Management at 10151 W Park Run Dr - 9,000+ units
Call WestCorp at 702-307-2881, ask for Jed Weidauer (Business Development)
enrichment_needed: Ovation (ovationco.com) - Rebecca Corey VP of Property Management needs email
Stout (smc-lv.com) - All regional managers need emails
All 'Unknown management' properties need management company identification
_action_items.key_insight: Per VENDTECH-RULES.md: Property managers get 10+ calls/month for smart markets. Pop-ins > cold calls. Gift baskets > brochures. Luxury Apartments 200+ units are TIER 1 locations. Greystar requires NetVendor certification. Never say 'vending machine' - say 'smart market' or 'amenity'.
